name: Southwestern Egg Rolls with Cilantro Avocado Sauce
description: Loaded with avocado, corn, beans and tomatoes! And you’ll never guess that it’s completely baked!
recipeIngredient: 1  15-ounce can black beans, drained and rinsed
1 cup corn kernels (frozen, canned or roasted)
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper (to taste)
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper (to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: PREHEAT oven to 425 degrees F. Line a large baking pan with Reynolds Wrap® Heavy Duty Foil. Grease or spray foil to prevent sticking.
recipeInstructions.name: PREHEAT oven to 425 degrees F. Line a large baking pan with Reynolds Wrap® Heavy Duty Foil. Grease or spray foil to prevent sticking.

recipeInstructions.text: COMBINE avocado, cilantro, sour cream, jalapeno, mayonnaise, garlic and lime juice in the bowl of a food processor; season with salt and pepper to taste. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: COMBINE avocado, cilantro, sour cream, jalapeno, mayonnaise, garlic and lime juice in the bowl of a food processor; season with salt and pepper to taste. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: MASH avocados using a potato masher. Add black beans, corn, tomato, lime juice, chili powder, cumin, salt and pepper, to taste, and gently toss to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: MASH avocados using a potato masher. Add black beans, corn, tomato, lime juice, chili powder, cumin, salt and pepper, to taste, and gently toss to combine.

recipeInstructions.text: PLACE avocado mixture in the center of each wrapper. Bring the bottom edge of the wrapper tightly over the filling, folding in the sides. Continue rolling until the top of the wrapper is reached. Using your finger, rub the edges of the wrapper with water, pressing to seal. Repeat with remaining wrappers and avocado mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: PLACE avocado mixture in the center of each wrapper. Bring the bottom edge of the wrapper tightly over the filling, folding in the sides. Continue rolling until the top of the wrapper is reached. Using your finger, rub the edges of the wrapper with water, pressing to seal. Repeat with remaining wrappers and avocado mixture.

recipeInstructions.text: PLACE egg rolls onto the prepared baking dish. Lightly coat with nonstick spray.
recipeInstructions.name: PLACE egg rolls onto the prepared baking dish. Lightly coat with nonstick spray.

recipeInstructions.text: PLACE into oven and bake until golden brown and crisp, about 18-20 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: PLACE into oven and bake until golden brown and crisp, about 18-20 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: SERVE immediately with cilantro dipping sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: SERVE immediately with cilantro dipping sauce.
